description: The BEST rental apartment building in the city, 42nd street and 11ave, right by Hudson River. With breathtaking views of uptown manhattan. Within walking distance to the A,C,E subway train. Grocery store right across the street. If you are lucky, you might get to see Carmelo Anthony or kristapz prozingis who both live in the penthouse of the building!
name: Sky NYC
review: The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
